channel.title: 508 Connection problems
channel.description: Everytime someone logs into my server, every player either lags or dcs. I'm not sure what causes this. Can anyone help?

item.title: 508 Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @kennelz kennelz
item.description:
@kennelz wrote:

Well my best guess would be in the net packet for all connections. I did add a protect.java file which helps to stop spammers and nullers greatly. I dont know if these extra checks would be causing the problem? Its my common sense that tells me its with the connection files since connection is the problem. If theres another problem causing this that has nothing to do with connections, I would need a hint. I do remember most of the changes from commands to adding trade.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

in that case, You have changed something somewhere, and its causing this, Think back to what you have changed.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @kennelz kennelz
item.description:
@kennelz wrote:

One, my computer is far from crap. Its better than my old hosting computer. I could see how customs cause this, but I do not use any customly made items, I’ve only renamed a few items from the item.cfg. There is two instances that either everyone will lag for a few seconds and resume a stable state or one person logs in and everyone else DCs without being able to reconnect. Usually after a few server restarts it goes back to normal. I’ve used this source (ranopscape or something like that) or about a year. The first time I had it, there was no problem like this. Then a year later, i’m getting this kind of problem and yes I have greatly changed the source.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Connection problems
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

Server source you are using, and maybe just maybe that players might have an unsupported item like a custom you installed into the client and when he wears it and logs in it crashers the server because i have seen it happen that way.

Read full topic

Everytime someone logs into my server, every player either lags or dcs. I’m not sure what causes this. Can anyone help?

Your computer is crap?
